name: Not About Me
description:
During a co-op session, your friend lost network connection and went afk. Now it’s your responsibility to push them to the next level before the timer runs out and the deadly zone catches up to you.

Gameplay:

  • both you and your friend must be at the “Finish” to progress to the next level.
  • Left-Click to punch and push your friend.
  • A/D to move left/right. “Space” to jump/double jump.
  • Jump Pad launches characters in the moving direction.
  • Air Currents move characters in the arrow direction.
  • Portal teleports characters to the other portal.
  • Hook (looks like a dark arrow): E button to pick it up (or destroy if you already have it). Aim with mouse, and Right-Click to shoot out, and pull your friend to you with it.

Sprites:

Streets of Fight https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/characters/streets-of-fight-211512

Music:

Extreme Sport Trap Music | PISTA by Alex-Productions | https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCx0_M61F81Nfb-BRXE-SeVA Music promoted by https://www.chosic.com/free-music/all/ Creative Commons CC BY 3.0 https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/
